title:
Determination of the QCD running coupling in the entire perturbative
  regime from a single experiment using the Principle of Maximum Conformality
authors:
Leonardo Di Giustino, Stanley J. Brodsky, Philip G. Ratcliffe,
  Sheng-Quan Wang, Xing-Gang Wu
abstract:
We present a new approach for determining the strong coupling $\alpha_s(Q)$
over the entire perturbative range of validity, for scales from
$\Lambda_{\mathrm{QCD}}$ up to the Planck scale ${\sim}10^{19}$\,GeV, with the
highest precision and using the data of just a single experiment. The results
obtained with this method are consistent with world averages and exhibit
improved precision with respect to previous reports.
